overview: Just because couples decide to explore sex outside their marriage doesn't mean they're unsatisfied. In fact, a lot of couples actively embrace hotwifing as a way of enhancing an already happy marriage. In this release, four couples in varying stages of hotwifing seek out strangers, friends, and even bartenders to indulge in their wildest fantasies.
tagline: It's never too late to indulge a little
title: The Hot Wives 4
